summary: The meeting discussed the tasks required to finalize the quarterly report. John was assigned to gather and compile sales data using the shared template, coordinate with Sean Mukherjee for marketing input, and update the project management tool with proper task assignments. All tasks need to be completed by Friday, with a final review before submission.
todo_work: Gather and compile sales data from the last quarter using the shared template and send it to the finance team by Friday.
Coordinate with Sean Mukherjee to get updated graphics and charts for the quarterly presentation by tomorrow.
Update the project management tool with proper task assignments by the end of the day.
Send an update to the meeting organizer once all tasks are completed for a final review.
